in_ports.name: table
in_ports.hint: Source table: array of int indexes.

out_ports.name: table
out_ports.hint:
Inverse table R. If the source table is S and the indexing base is B,
then R[S[k]−B]=B+k.
Elements of R, for which there is no corresponding index S[k]−B, are filled by −1.
If several elements S[k] are equal, then R[S[k]−B] will be the minimal from several possible indexes B+k.

controls.caption: Indexing base
controls.name: indexingBase
controls.description: See comments to the output table
